transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste sir.
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Kaise hain sir aap? Main Sunil ki baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se senior manager.
Customer: Haan sir boliye na sir. Bahut dinon ke baad.
Executive: Ekdam badhiya sir. Ji ji. Beech mein mera na department change ho gaya tha aur uske baad ye promotion vagaira so uski vajah se but aap hi dekha meri hi team mein aapka hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Log aur ye sab hain. Abhi kal hi aapki discussion hua hoga abhi aapka.
Customer: Haan sir abhi ek mam ka mere subah hi phone hua tha. Sir ek bahut dinon se matlab aap jab the us waqt se jo dikkat hai ki matlab buyleads bahut kam aa rahi hai aur jo direct inquiry aati hai wo bhi kam matlab band hi hai. Direct call bhi almost band hai sir, ye dono bhi aur buyleads jo main consume karti hu wo bhi kam hi hai. Abhi dekho to dekhoge to mere 17 abhi aaj kaun sa day hai? Friday hai. Kal week last week ka last day. Tabhi bhi mere paas 17 buyleads hai available.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To matlab buyleads mein available hi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Maine dekha sir abhi morning mein wo cheez check bhi kiya tha aur aapko maine na aap ek baar zara WhatsApp kholiye sir.
Customer: Kiska?
Executive: Maine aapko report aapka WhatsApp number kholiye zara maine aapko ek report dali hai jisme aap dekhiye ki jo pichla mahina hamare paas jo lead aaya tha na October month ke andar, is month ke andar kitna lead generate hua matlab IndiaMART pe abhi tak buylead aaya kitna hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Is report mein clear basis pe dikh raha hai ki hamare paas na abhi recently market mein bhi ho sakta hai do reason ki ya to market down chal raha ho ya phir buyers IndiaMART pe kam aa raha hoga ki October aur November mein hamare paas bahut limited lead aaya. 190 lead only for 190 buylead hamare paas.
Customer: Sir ye pura sir pura saal bhi bologe na comparison pehle pichle 10 saal ka nikaloge aur is saal ka nikaloge to is saal mein bahut dikkat aa rahi hai. Bahut matlab bahut dikkat hai is saal.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur recently pichle teen mahinon mein to thoda sa relief hai. Abhi aap dekho November mein sirf hamare paas 31 lead hai. Saat din ho chuke hai 31 lead aaya aur pichle October mein 190 buyleads generate hua. Kyunki IndiaMART kya kar raha hai na abhi thoda ispe bhi workout kar raha hai ki jo genuine buyer hota hai exactly pehle kya hota tha na sir lead hamare ko bahut jyada milta tha but log call karte the client deny kar deta tha ya phir bolte the main aise hi visit kar raha hun.
Customer: Barabar.
Executive: Abhi ye thoda sa issue aapko kam dekhne ko mil raha hoga kyunki IndiaMART kya kar raha hai na us lead ko pehle proper verify karne ke baad post kar raha hai iski vajah se thoda sa iska quantity kam hua hai. Dusri cheez ye hai ki abhi thoda market bhi down chal raha hai to dono cheez yahan pe face karne ko dekhne ko mil rahi hai sir.
Customer: Lekin itne 10 saal se itna niche ab pehli baar gaya hai sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Matlab bahut takleef ho rahi hai. Bahut matlab bahut takleef. Sab calculation hil gaya hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Aur maine na ek report aur dekha tha sir ki consumption kya thi. Maan lo agar market mein mere paas pichle mahine 100 200 lead aaya tha average usme se hamari company Smartwell Printer ne kitna lead consume kiya? To humne kareeb kareeb market ka jitna bhi lead aa raha tha uska 50% lead consume kar liya tha. Matlab 100 lead ke kareeb humne consume kiya tha pichle mahine mein sir.
Customer: Barabar.
Executive: Hai na? 83 lead dikha raha hai matlab 45 to 50% client ka lead humne itna market competition hote hue bhi consume kar liya. To yahan pe as a dekha jaye to technically sab barabar chal raha hai. Visibility bhi theek hai ki jo bhi buylead aa rahi hai immediate basis pe aapko uska notification do ya phir show karna sari cheeze meri team ki side se proper chal rahi hai. But thoda sa is cheez ko samajhiye ki market down aur lead kam aane ki vajah se ye thoda sa ho raha hai.
Customer: Ye kab tak sort out ho sakta hai?
Executive: Sir isme bhi thoda sa na mere is saal mujhe bahut matlab bahut ye kharab gaya. Bahut kharab gaya sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Conversion kaise mil raha hai waise? Conversion bhi nahi mil raha apne ko.
Executive: Nahi aap aap pichli baar aapse bhi baat ho raha tha to wahi wahi main bol raha tha ki conversion ratio bhi achcha nahi hai kyunki sorry.
Customer: Haan. Jo buyleads mein consume karta hun usme bhi ho jata hai ki maine ye iske regarding inquiry nahi ki hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Immediate nahi ki matlab ye to bahut sare jo consume abhi to ye kuch dekhta hi nahi hun main ki ye buyleads ka kisne kiske liye kiya hai kya hai sirf hai na ab aise hi dikhta hai jo main kar deta hun.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Matlab conversion ration bhi achcha nahi kyunki mere paas 2020 22 se jitne buyleads main consume karta hun ya ye call se attend kiya ho ya direct aaye hue ho ya buy kiye hue ho sabke mere paas excel mein hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab uske date ki date wise hai. Matlab date hai, naam hai, contact number hai, state state hai, jo location hai aur kiske liye unhone inquiry kiya hai ye bhi main rakh deta hun record kyunki mujhe pure saal ka mujhe dekhna padta hai ki ab main mera kya ho raha hai business mein.
Executive: Okay. Ye mujhe karna padta hai.
Customer: To isse comparison kar kiya to main shock hun is saal. Bahut shock hun.
Executive: Okay okay. Isme ek kaam karte hain sir. Dekhiye IndiaMART ke paas na do tarike ka source hai lead generate karne ka. Ek to buylead ho gaya dusra hota hai direct inquiry. Theek hai? Ab direct inquiry depend karta hai visibility ki market mein agar hamara koi bhi student abacus ho ya abacus book ho ya abacus koi bhi product search kar raha hai to mere IndiaMART portal pe Smart Printer and Manufacturers kahan pe dikh rahi hai? To abhi company ki listing to waise theek hai lekin isme hum log ek kaam kar sakte hain isko cheez ko aur improve karne ke liye na ek parameter apne ko theek karna padega jo callback karte hain aap buyer ko wo kahan se karte hain thoda sa mujhe batayenge sir?
Customer: Hmm. Kahan se matlab?
Executive: Buyers ko jo aap call karte hain wo manually number type karke karte hain ya phir kis kaise tarike se aap connect karte hain client ko buyer ko?
Customer: Manually manually.
Executive: Manually na? Isme thoda sa hame changes karna padega ki jo IndiaMART ka application hai na usme jo call ka option aata hai na sir wo jaise hi aap uspe click karenge to ya to call chala jayega ya system se jab aap kar rahe the scanner ban ke aata hai.
Customer: Nahi actually kya hota hai sir ki main itne sare call attend main khud akela nahi kar sakta to mera staff hai to main kya karta hun buylead consume karne ke baad mera group rehta hai jo mere staff jo ye char panch jan jo call karte hain to us group mein main dal deta hun ki bhai inko call kar dijiye to wo kya karte hain ki samajh le group mein char panch jan hai na to wo kisne call kiya uska naam niche aa jata hai wo wo mark kar deta hai ki ye main kar raha hun. Immediately kar dete hain main aapko uska screenshot bhi bhej deta hun. To wo mark karke wo wo kar dete hain aur uske baad uske baad aage ka kaise hota hai ki dopahar ke baad matlab samajh lijiye ki maine subah wo buyleads consume kiya hai to dopahar mein main uska feedback le leta hun ki ab ye kya kisne kisne kidhar kidhar kab kab call kiya unka feedback kiya hai. Okay samajh lijiye phone nahi uthaya to wo main khud main khud unko office call kar deta hun. Barabar hai samajh lijiye utha liya to unka kya feedback hai wo main likh leta hun. Matlab unko WhatsApp pe samajh lijiye nahi uthaya hai to WhatsApp pe bhi unko details bhej dete compulsory bhej deta hun main. Aise nahi ki phone nahi uthaya to chalo aage chale jate hain aisa kuch nahi hota hai. Matlab itna micro bolte hain na itna main wo dekh leta hun.
Executive: Matlab ki jo ek client ko follow up liya jata hai proper tarike se jo hona chahiye tha wo aap apni side se karte hain correct sir?
Customer: Correct. Ek kaam kar micro kar deta hun kyunki kaise hota hai ki main pratyek staff ko main wo ye kaise de dun na aur wo mujhe samajh mein kaise aayega ki ab isne kab kiya hai kisne kaun sa call kiya hai kyunki mere paas char panch hai mujhe Prathamesh hai, Dhanashree hai, Pratiksha hai ye sab log call kar dete hain aur unka record alag rehta hai aur mere paas record alag rehta hai.
Executive: Aapka office time kya rehta hai?
Customer: Wo bhi rakhte hain aur main bhi rakhta hun. Haan?
Executive: Aapka office time kya rehta hai Sadul ji?
Customer: Office time subah 9:00 se 6:00.
Executive: 9:00 se 6:00 na? To main aapko 12:00 baje tak ek baar connect back karun system pe hi maine kuch cheeze aapko guide karta hun ki jo callback ka process usko thoda sa change karna padega jo aap apni side se karte hain wo as it is rakhiye lekin main aapko na kuch steps batata hun uske accordingly aap thoda sa follow up karke rakhiye taki na IndiaMART pe teen char parameters hote hain ki mera supplier kis tarike se services ko utilize kar raha hai to callback wala na jo scenario hai wo miss ho raha hai to usko agar improve karenge to apne paas direct inquiry ka flow badh jayega visibility ke basis pe sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? To ye hum thoda sa isko improvement kar sakte hain jiske basis pe buyleads to dekhiye similar rehta hai uspe koi wo service parameters ka nahi rehta hai lekin agar hum log callback ko thoda sa improve karenge na ki wo kaise karna hai main aap apni side se wo jo aap process kar rahe hain wo aap karte rahiyega lekin isme kuch thoda sa add on kar denge jo cheez main guide kar dunga. Sir uske basis pe apne company visibility sir sir sir sir samajh lijiye ki main pehle kya karta tha ki daily char panch ya panch che buyleads main consume karta tha. Barabar hai? Magar panch che ko main akele har baar call nahi kar sakta to mujhe wo staff ko dena padta hai. Nahi nahi aapko bolunga bhi nahi sir lekin wo staff wo staff kaise karega wo main aapko batata hun ki staff kaise karega uske liye main guide karunga. Wo char logon mein se kisne kiya hai ye kaise samajh mein aayega ki samajh lijiye ki mere paas jaise maine naam diya ki Prathamesh hai, Dhanashree hai, Pratiksha hai, Pranjal hai samajh lijiye ki wo che mein se Prathamesh ne kitne kiye, Pranjal ne kitne kiye ye follow up kaise karunga? Uske baad kya ho raha hai ki uska unke incentive bhi rehta hai. Samajh lijiye ki ek ek ne close kiya 10,000 ka business de diya to uske upar unko incentive bhi rehta hai to wo kaise hota hai ki maine call kiya hai usne call kiya hai ye jhagda ho jata hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan ye bhi mujhe takleef ho jati hai iske liye main alag alag kar deta hun.
Executive: Ji na theek hai to ek baar details mein discuss karte hain sir isko kaise improve karte hain iska kuch solution nikalte hain main 12:00 12:30 tak aapko connect back karun.
Customer: Theek hai. Tab tak main apna pura catalog vagaira review kar leta hun aur kuch missing rehta hai us report ke sath mein hum log ek baar 12:15 connect back karte hain.
Executive: Theek hai. Kyunki kaise hai sir ye aapke system pe hai na main har baar kuch na kuch kar leta hun ho jata hai lekin results kuch nahi aata hai kyunki pichli baar bola sir mam ne ki ab aap aur ek number dal dijiye wo number dal diya usme bhi kuch result nahi aaya. Aapne aap aapne hi kuch bahut baar kuch na kuch changes kiya hua hai. Aap jab the barabar hai us waqt bhi kuch der result aaya tha kidhar aaya result aap dekh lijiye aapke record hoga to pichle ji ji ji.
Customer: 10 saal ka chhod dijiye pichle do saal ka nikal dijiye records. Pichle do saal ka aur is saal ka is saal ka is saal ka comparison kar dijiye to aapko samajh mein aayega.
Executive: Main apni side se pura pura cross check kar leta hun aur after that ek baar details mein discuss karte hain isko video meeting pe baith ke every report ko sir. Haan.
Customer: Haan. Sir video record karne ki zarurat hi nahi hai sir aap dekh lo pichle do saal ka nikalo record aur is saal ka record nikalo.
Executive: Aisa kar leta hun main apni side se ek baar pura check karke ek baar apne ko connect back kar leta hun. Main 10 saal ka bhi nahi bol raha hun do saal ka nikalo kyunki main 100% sure hun ki main maine kya bola ki 2022 se mere paas record hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jitne maine buyleads consume kiya hai direct call aaya hai direct mail aaya hai jisne direct inquiry kiya hai mail through ya kiski bhi through unka sab record mere paas hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aur date wise hai date wise hai aur mere paas abhi active kitne franchise hai IndiaMART se mere paas kitne active kiske paas franchise matlab ye kya customer hai wo bhi hai matlab Prathamesh ke paas kitna hai Pranjal ke paas kitna hai wo bhi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Lekin jaise jo fresh fresh blood rehta hai na wo daily aana chahiye. Jo fresh fresh inquiry rehti hai na wo add hona chahiye.
Executive: Main samajh gaya. To iske liye main ek baar pura check kar leta hun sir report nikal ke aur main call pe hi aapse connect karta hun 12:15 12:30 tak.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads and direct inquiries are very low.

- Conversion ratio is not good.

- Difficulty tracking staff performance and incentives.



Resolution:

- Executive will guide on improving callback process.

- Executive will review customer's catalog and reports.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect with customer by 12:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, conversion, follow up
